title: Ablation Testing Explained: What Actually Moves the Needle
summary: Design ablations that reveal causal contributors and avoid cargo‑cult tweaks.
bodyMd:
## Why
Ablations clarify which modules/features matter.

## Patterns
- One‑at‑a‑time feature drops
- Module on/off
- Interaction checks

## Reporting
Summarise deltas with effect sizes; include in evidence for reviewers.
